description: [Daggerfly](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1034) utilizes victim machine operating system information to create custom User Agent strings for subsequent command and control communication.(Citation: ESET EvasivePanda 2024)

external_references.description: Ahn Ho, Facundo Muñoz, & Marc-Etienne M.Léveillé. (2024, March 7). Evasive Panda leverages Monlam Festival to target Tibetans. Retrieved July 25, 2024.
